scripts.report1: npx newman run https://www.getpostman.com/collections/f6ec90ec43eb477ab7d6 -d dataset/satellitePositionDataSet.json --suppress-exit-code 1 -r --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/reportISSSatellitePosAPI.html htmlextra
scripts.report2: npx newman run https://www.getpostman.com/collections/d9651a01d60ddbfd16a1 -d dataset/satelliteTLEDataSet.json  --suppress-exit-code 1 -r --reporter-htmlextra-export newman/reportISSSatelliteTLEAPI.html htmlextra
